item.title: Cenci
item.description: Description Mardi Gras dessert Ingredients 1 3/4 cups (225 g) flour 2 tablespoons unsalted butter 1/3 cup confectioners sugar 2 eggs 1 tablespoon brandy A pinch of salt More confectionerâ€™s sugar for dusting Oil for deep frying Directions Make a fairly stiff dough with these ingredients, kneading it thoroughly, and adding more flour if it comes out too soft. Flour it and let it rest, covered tightly with plastic wrap, for about an hour.
